properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
VIRGIN ISLANDS TO TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO.
96 FOOT S/V TALOFA, BLUE HULL, THREE PERSONS
ON BOARD, OVERDUE SAINT THOMAS (18-20N 064-55W)
TO TRINIDAD (10-27N 061-15W). LAST KNOWN
POSITION 11-45N 063-40W AT 191351Z JUL. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO U.S. COAST GUARD SAN JUAN,
PHONE: 787 289 2041, E-MAIL: SSJCC@USCG.MIL.
